subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit 3.4 + RedHat Linux 7.0 == 2 test failures?
msgSnippet: I think there is already a bug in the bug parade for that: http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4388732.html Go vote for it if it annoys you!
messageBody:
I think there is already a bug in the bug parade for that:
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4388732.html

Go vote for it if it annoys you!

Mathieu

>Eric
